column1: bina ka hanong reutlwe jwale na ureng
i ya rona batswetse ba tlokweng
ntlele hore keyourekela mose omong hape
i ya rona batswetse ba tlokweng
nchebe skana waetsa tjena keutlotse hantle
ebile ha hona lehe leleng la nta hlohong mona
jwale he ako umpolelle utlaya neng sekolong
ska moneha eksaese yaka uaetabola nnake
feela ha ure ae mme ueneha likhapa aetabola
maru ke ana letsatsi ke lena le dinonyana
ache haeba ntja ena eloma motho ke mohlolo
banna we ke mang lebitso la ntja
he motho ha atsabe motho enwa
ha uikerimme tjee ebile ubenya metsi mamina auhlopha
ha usatsebe hoja ukhaletse dijo tse horeng
tlisa ketlobona kerimi ela e kae
mamakhoa ake unehele ausi mamello moseme oo
motho eo kebapalang le yena omphile tsengata
